welcome.title: Welcome to JAI1, {{firstName}}!
welcome.message: We're ready to help you with your tax return. Complete your profile and upload your documents to get started.

document_reviewed.title: We reviewed your document
document_reviewed.message: {{firstName}}, we've reviewed your {{documentType}} "{{fileName}}". Everything looks good, we're moving forward with your case.

docs_missing.title: {{firstName}}, we need some documents
docs_missing.message: To continue with your return, please upload these documents: {{missingDocs}}. Go to the Documents section to upload them.

ticket_response.title: You have a response from support
ticket_response.message: {{firstName}}, we replied to your question about: {{subject}}. Check the full message in the Support section.

referral_new.title: Someone used your referral code!
referral_new.message: {{referredName}} just signed up with your code. When they complete their process, you'll get your discount.

referral_successful.title: Your referral was successful!
referral_successful.message: {{firstName}}, {{referredName}} completed their return. You now have ${{amount}} discount available for your next refund.

discount_applied.title: Discount applied: ${{amount}}
discount_applied.message: {{firstName}}, we applied your ${{amount}} referral discount. It will be automatically deducted from your next payment.

problem_set.title: {{firstName}}, we need your attention
problem_set.message: {{description}}. Go to Support to resolve this with our team.

problem_resolved.title: Problem resolved
problem_resolved.message: {{firstName}}, the issue with your case has been resolved. We're continuing to work on your return.

alarm_verification_timeout.title: Update on your verification
alarm_verification_timeout.message: {{firstName}}, your {{track}} return has been in verification for {{days}} days. Go to Support to review next steps with our team.

alarm_letter_sent.title: Reminder: check your mail
alarm_letter_sent.message: {{days}} days ago, a letter was sent about your {{track}} return. If you received it, contact us in Support for guidance on how to respond.

alarm_general.title: There's news about your case
alarm_general.message: {{firstName}}, we have an important update about your {{track}} return. Check your status in Tracking or write to us in Support.

status_federal_filed.title: Federal return submitted to the IRS
status_federal_filed.message: {{firstName}}, we've submitted your federal return. The IRS will begin processing it in the coming days.

status_federal_processing.title: The IRS is processing your return
status_federal_processing.message: {{firstName}}, your federal return is being processed. We'll notify you when there are updates.

status_federal_approved.title: Your federal refund was approved!
status_federal_approved.message: {{firstName}}, the IRS approved your federal refund. Estimated deposit date: {{estimatedDate}}

status_federal_deposited.title: Federal refund deposited!
status_federal_deposited.message: {{firstName}}, your federal refund of ${{amount}} is now in your account. Congratulations!

status_federal_rejected.title: Federal return rejected
status_federal_rejected.message: {{firstName}}, your federal return was rejected by the IRS. Contact support for more information.

status_state_filed.title: State return submitted
status_state_filed.message: {{firstName}}, we submitted your state return. Now we just wait for processing.

status_state_processing.title: Processing your state return
status_state_processing.message: {{firstName}}, your state is reviewing your return. We'll keep you updated on the progress.

status_state_approved.title: State refund approved!
status_state_approved.message: {{firstName}}, your state refund was approved. Estimated deposit date: {{estimatedDate}}

status_state_deposited.title: State refund deposited!
status_state_deposited.message: {{firstName}}, your state refund of ${{amount}} is now available in your account. Excellent!

status_state_rejected.title: State return rejected
status_state_rejected.message: {{firstName}}, your state return was rejected. Contact support for more information.
